title: Episode #22 - What's The History Of Albinism?
itunes:author: History Is Sexy
itunes:summary:
This time on History is Sexy, Emma and Janina dive into a listener's question about the history of people with albinism. Why did the Romans think they came from Albania? How has their history shaped understandings of race? and what challenges do they face in our modern world?
